data.title: FC Twente vs Almere City Prediction: Team to Win, Form, News
data.meta_description: Here is our prediction for the upcoming Eredivisie game between FC Twente and Almere City on Wednesday, April 24th 2024.
data.text:
As FC Twente and Almere City prepare to face off at De Grolsch Veste on the 24th of April, expectations are high for a thrilling Eredivisie clash.

With crucial points on the line, both teams are gearing up for a critical confrontation in the league standings.

Current Form

FC Twente's Current Form

FC Twente is vying to cement their position in the top three, aiming for Europa League qualification.

Despite a minor hiccup with two defeats in their last five matches, their resolve remains strong.

Their recent loss to Ajax, where they were leading until halftime, has only increased the stakes for their upcoming games.

Almere City's Current Form

Almere City has been the surprise package this season, fighting fiercely to avoid relegation.

With an impressive streak of six consecutive draws, they've managed to keep their heads above water, albeit without a win in their last eight matches.

Their resilience on the road will be tested again as they aim to extend their unbeaten away run.

Team News

FC Twente Team News

FC Twente's lineup remains relatively stable with only minor tweaks expected.

Key players like Ricky van Wolfswinkel will be crucial, while Anass Salah-Eddine and Alfons Sampsted might provide fresh legs in the defence.

Almere City Team News

Injury concerns linger for Almere City, with several players such as Danny Post and Yann Kitala sidelined.

The team will rely on Rajiv van La Parra, who stepped in effectively in their last outing, to maintain their momentum forward.

Key Players

FC Twente's Key Players

Van Wolfswinkel's experience and goal-scoring ability will be vital for Twente as they look to exploit Almere City's defensive vulnerabilities.

Almere City's Key Players

Van La Parra's adaptability and offensive skills will be central to Almere's strategy, aiming to counter Twente's attacking threats.

Scoreline Prediction

FC Twente appears poised to take advantage of their strong home record and the urgency of their European aspirations, likely leading to a 2-1 victory over Almere City.

FAQ

What time does the FC Twente vs Almere City match start? The match is scheduled for 5.45 pm UK time on April 24, 2024.

Where will the match be played? The match will be played at De Grolsch Veste, Enschede.
